programme.title: Fanny Cradock Cooks for...
programme.desc: ...Christmas: Your Christmas Bird. 1/5. Fanny presents a collection of traditional Christmas recipes.

programme.title: Fanny Cradock Cooks for...
programme.desc: ...Christmas: Christmas Pudding. 2/5. Fanny shares her recipe for Christmas pudding and the method for making the old-fashioned 'round pudding'.

programme.title: Fanny Cradock Cooks for...
programme.desc: ...Christmas: Your Christmas Cake. 3/5. Fanny Cradock gives you two recipes to choose from, the traditional black plum cake or an unusual 'white' Christmas cake.

programme.title: Fanny Cradock Cooks for...
programme.desc: ...Christmas: Royal Mincemeat. 4/5. Practical know-how to make Christmas cookery easier for the layman. Fanny has unusual recipes for pies, pancakes, omelettes and Swiss rolls using mincemeat.

programme.title: Fanny Cradock Cooks for Christmas: Petit Fours
programme.desc: 5/5. Today's show contains Fanny's recipe for choux pastry with advice on making miniature eclairs, choux buns and glac icing.
